response.name: UserPromptTemplate

url.raw: {{baseURL}}/api/email?customerName=Madan&customerMessage=I am not able to access my account, it says account locked. please help

query.value: Madan
I am not able to access my account, it says account locked. please help

response.body:
Dear Madan,

Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand how concerning it can be when you are unable to access your account, and I’m here to assist you.

An account lock can occur for several reasons, typically for security purposes. To help you regain access, I recommend following these steps:

1. Please check your email for any messages from us regarding your account status, as it may contain instructions on how to unlock it.
2. If you haven’t received any emails, you can try resetting your password using the “Forgot Password” link on the login page. This often resolves access issues.
3. If the problem persists, please provide me with any relevant details, such as the email associated with your account, and I will escalate this issue to our support team for further assistance.

Rest assured, we are committed to resolving this matter as quickly as possible so you can access your account without further delay. 

Thank you for your patience, and I look forward to assisting you further.

Best regards,
